long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the classic Nokia Snake game, now available as a Chrome extension! Relive the nostalgia of one of the most iconic mobile games ever created, right in your browser. This extension faithfully recreates the simple yet addictive gameplay that captivated millions. Use the arrow keys to navigate your snake, gobble up the food, and watch it grow longer. But be carefulâ€”colliding with the walls or your own tail ends the game! Perfect for a quick break or a trip down memory lane, this extension is a must-have for fans of retro gaming. Download now and start slithering!
